student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! How are you today? Do you like parks?
I am good! Yes, I like park.
That's great! I like parks too. There are two parks near my home, Park A and Park B. Which one do you think is better, a big park or a small park?
I think big park is better.
Why do you think a big park is better? Is it because you can play more games or walk more?
Because I can walk more and see more things.
That's a good point. Park A is bigger, so you can walk more and see more things. Park B is smaller, but it has a nice lake. Which one would you like to visit, Park A or Park B?
I would like to visit Park A.
I think you'll like Park A. It's very beautiful and you can walk a lot. Park A and Park B are different, but both are nice. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
